### Settings

```{r settings}
  actionButton('start','Start')
  actionButton('stop','Stop')
  actionButton('reset','Reset')
  numericInput('seconds','Seconds:',value=5,min=0,max=99999,step=1)
  hr()
  selectInput(
        "lang",
        label = "Select your language",
        choices = languages,
        selected = "",
        multiple = FALSE
      )
  selectInput(
        "tt",
        label = "Training type",
        choices = "",
        selected = "",
        multiple = FALSE
      )
  selectInput(
        "gr",
        label = "Training groups",
        choices = "",
        selected = "",
        multiple = TRUE
      )
```



```{r udpate-settings}

# update training type based on language
  observeEvent(input$lang, {
    tts <- training_type(input$lang)
    
    updateSelectInput(
      session,
      "tt",
      choices = c(tts, ""),
      selected = ""
    )
  })

# update training groups based on training type
  observeEvent(input$tt, {
      
      tts <- training_type(input$lang)
      
      updateSelectInput(
        session,
        "tt",
        choices = c(tts, ""),
        selected = ""
      )
  })



```

```{r}
  # Initialize the timer, 5 seconds, not active.
  timer <- reactiveVal(5)
  active <- reactiveVal(FALSE)

  # observer that invalidates every second. If timer is active, decrease by one.
  observe({
    invalidateLater(1000, session)
    isolate({
      if(active()) {

        timer(timer()-1)
        if(timer()<1)
        {
          # active(FALSE)
          # showModal(modalDialog(
          #   title = "Important message",
          #   "Countdown completed!"
          # ))

          timer(input$seconds)

        }
      }
    })
  })

  # observers for actionbuttons
  observeEvent(input$start, {
    timer(input$seconds)
    active(TRUE)
    })
  observeEvent(input$stop, {active(FALSE)})
  observeEvent(input$reset, {timer(input$seconds)})

```


```{r timeleft}
# Output the time left.
  textOutput('timeleft')
  renderText({
    paste("Time left: ", seconds_to_period(timer()))
  })
  
```


```{r word}
textOutput('word')
output$word <-   renderText({
    invalidateLater(input$seconds*1000)
    if(active()) {
      sample(words, 1)
    }
  })

```
